TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_medea, title = medea, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/medea} }

S.FORM: a tja kineljang aicu a ti medea i tua milimilingan nua segeris (Greece) mavan aljak a vavayan nua mazangilj nua secolchis (Colchis) i aites (AeÃ«tes), a vuvu a vavayan nua cemas nua qadav i hilius (Helios). a kemasi sinansenay a tjiuguni (Theogony) ni hisiud (Hesiod) a tjevuta ti medea a kiseljang tjai djasun (Jason) kati argunauc (Argonauts) namatazua i pasusangas tua 2700 a cavilj (700 BCE) a vinecikan tua milimilingan.
